wikipedia_page.main: John Maines (born 10 December 1948) is a musician, trombone player and active figure in the British brass band movement as a performer, conductor, tutor, compere and concert presenter.

response: *John Maines (born 1948 in Warrington), musician, trombone player and active figure in the British brass band movement as a performer, conductor, tutor, compere and concert presenter
